home.subtitle: 5000 unique souls, forged in the crucible of web culture. Each fish is a byte of history, a pixel of rebellion. Are you ready to own a piece of the stream?

mint_card.title: Secure Minting
mint_card.status_connect_prompt: Connect your wallet to verify eligibility.
mint_card.feedback_success: Mint successful! Welcome to the Army!

lore.title: The Legend of the Digital Stream
lore.p1: In the beginning, there was the Great Meme Stream, a chaotic torrent of data where every byte of digital culture was born. From this stream emerged the First Ones—the Rage Comics, the Doges, the Pepes. They were formless, powerful, but ephemeral.
lore.p2: A mysterious coder, known only as 'The Angler', saw the need for permanence. Using a fusion of blockchain alchemy and generative art, The Angler created 5,000 vessels: The MemeFish. Each fish captured the essence of a meme, giving it an eternal, ownable form within the 'Internet's Fish Tank'—the Binance Smart Chain blockchain.
lore.p3: These are not mere JPEGs. They are soul-bound relics of internet history. HODL Fish clutching their coins, WAGMI Fish cheering on the charts, and Leek Fish symbolizing the fallen. Now, the stream calls for new guardians. It's your turn to cast the line.

features.title: Anatomy of a MemeFish
features.subtitle: Every fish is a unique combination of algorithmically generated, yet culturally significant, traits.
features.item1_desc: From classic Rage faces to modern crypto slang like 'HODL' and 'WAGMI'. Some fish are even satirical takes on韭菜 (Leeks) or Stud (梭哈) culture.
features.item2_desc: A vast pool of traits including Doge's side-eye, Bruh-face expressions, and laser eyes, ensuring no two fish share the same vibe.
features.item3_desc: Fish can be adorned with anything from programmer hoodies and suit-and-ties to streetwear from brands like Vlone and Off-White.
features.item4_desc: The scene is part of the story. Your fish might swim against a '404 Not Found' error, a 'To the Moon' rocket, or even a low-res, artifact-heavy 'masterpiece' background.

team.title: The Anglers
team.subtitle: The shadowy figures behind the genesis of the MemeFish Army.
team.member1_desc: The architect of the tank. Wrote the sacred texts that bind each fish's soul to the blockchain, ensuring their eternal existence.
team.member2_desc: The visionary who gazes into the Meme Stream and translates its chaos into the high-quality, generative art that defines each fish.
team.member3_desc: The voice of the Army. Spreads the legend of the MemeFish across the digital plains and rallies the community.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Your guide to navigating the Internet's Fish Tank.
faq.a1: It's a collection of 5000 unique, generative ERC-1155 NFTs on the Binance Smart Chain blockchain, each representing a piece of internet and meme culture.
faq.a2: It means the NFTs you mint are non-transferable. They are permanently bound to your wallet as a badge of honor, proving you are a true, early member of the Army.
faq.q3: How can I get on the whitelist?
faq.a3: Engage with us! Follow our Twitter, join our Discord, and participate in community events. True believers are always rewarded.
faq.a4: For whitelisted members, the mint is free. You only need to cover the gas fee on the Binance Smart Chain network.

footer.about: The Internet's Fish Tank. 5000 soul-bound relics of web culture, immortalized on the blockchain.
